00035 #include "btkLikelihoodDensity.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 // STL includes
00039 #include "cassert"
00040 #include "cmath"
00041 
00042 
00043 namespace btk
00044 {
00045 
00046 LikelihoodDensity::LikelihoodDensity(Signal *signal, SHModel *model)
00047 {
00048     assert(model);
00049     assert(signal);
00050 
00051 
00052     m_model  = model;
00053     m_signal = signal;
00054 
00055     m_directions = m_signal->getDirections();
00056     m_sigmas     = m_signal->getSigmas();
00057 
00058         m_logSqrt2PI = std::log(std::sqrt(2. * M_PI));
00059 }
00060 
00061 Real LikelihoodDensity::compute(Direction uk, Point xk, Direction mean)
00062 {
00063     // 1. Mean directon
00064     // we have it in parameters
00065 
00066 
00067     // 2. Compute alpha = arcos(vk.mean)
00068     Vector vk   = uk.toVector();
00069     Vector vmean = mean.toVector();
00070     Real alpha   = -std::acos(vk.x()*vmean.x() + vk.y()*vmean.y() + vk.z()*vmean.z());
00071 
00072 
00073     // 3. Compute rotation axis = (vk/\mean)
00074     Vector axis(vk.y()*vmean.z() - vk.z()*vmean.y(),
00075                 vk.z()*vmean.x() - vk.x()*vmean.z(),
00076                 vk.x()*vmean.y() - vk.y()*vmean.x());
00077 
00078 
00079     // 4. Build rotation matrix
00080     Real sinAlpha = std::sin(alpha);
00081     Real cosAlpha = std::cos(alpha);
00082     Real axisx2   = axis.x()*axis.x();
00083     Real axisy2   = axis.y()*axis.y();
00084     Real axisz2   = axis.z()*axis.z();
00085     Real axisxy   = axis.x()*axis.y();
00086     Real axisxz   = axis.x()*axis.z();
00087     Real axisyz   = axis.y()*axis.z();
00088     Real R11 = axisx2 + (1.-axisx2) * cosAlpha;
00089     Real R12 = axisxy*(1.-cosAlpha) - axis.z()*sinAlpha;
00090     Real R13 = axisxz*(1.-cosAlpha) + axis.y()*sinAlpha;
00091     Real R22 = axisy2 + (1.-axisy2)*cosAlpha;
00092     Real R23 = axisyz*(1.-cosAlpha) - axis.x()*sinAlpha;
00093     Real R33 = axisz2 + (1.-axisz2)*cosAlpha;
00094 
00095 
00096     // 5. Rotate all gradients coordinates
00097     std::vector<Direction> g;
00098     std::vector<Direction>::iterator dIt;
00099 
00100     for(dIt = m_directions->begin(); dIt != m_directions->end(); dIt++)
00101     {
00102         Vector tmp1 = dIt->toVector();
00103         Vector tmp2(tmp1.x()*R11 + tmp1.y()*R12 + tmp1.z()*R13,
00104                     tmp1.x()*R12 + tmp1.y()*R22 + tmp1.z()*R23,
00105                     tmp1.x()*R13 + tmp1.y()*R23 + tmp1.z()*R33);
00106 
00107         SphericalCoordinates s = tmp2.toSphericalCoordinates();
00108         Direction d(s.theta(), s.phi());
00109         g.push_back(d);
00110     } // for dIt
00111 
00112 
00113     // 6. Compute densities
00114     Real density = 0;
00115     Matrix S     = m_signal->signalAt(xk);
00116     Matrix M     = m_model->signalAt(xk,&g);
00117 
00118     for(unsigned int i=0; i<g.size(); i++)
00119     {
00120         Real mesuredSignal   = S(i,0);
00121         Real estimatedSignal = M(i,0);
00122 
00123         density += this->computeNormalDensity(m_sigmas->at(i), mesuredSignal - estimatedSignal);
00124     } // for i
00125 
00126 
00127     return density;
00128 }
00129 
00130 Real LikelihoodDensity::computeNormalDensity(Real sigma, Real x)
00131 {
00132     if(sigma != 0)
00133     {
00134         Real fraction = x / sigma;
00135 
00136         return ( -std::log(sigma) - m_logSqrt2PI - 0.5 * fraction * fraction );
00137     }
00138     else
00139         return 0;
00140 }
00141 
00142 } // namespace btk
